allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix suspend function calls and add detailed model loading logs

- Make unloadModelSync\(\) a suspend function to properly call stopStream\(\)
- Move unloadModelSync\(\) calls inside coroutine scope in loadGgufModel and loadCpuOnlyModel
- Add comprehensive logging for GPU/NPU configuration during model loading
- Log model type, plugin ID, config parameters, and load success/failure details

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
